Os presento un pequeÃƒÂ±o mod, por ahora solo contiene algunos componentes de base para crear satelites y sondas, estilo los que tenia el mod AIES.

El mod esta liberado bajo licencia libre y cualquiera puede ayudar en su desarrollo.

El link de descarga en kerbalstuff es el siguiente: [http://www.kerbalstuff.com/mod/615/Blackleg%20Industries](http://www.kerbalstuff.com/mod/615/Blackleg%20Industries)

El link del repositorio de desarrollo es el siguiente: [https://github.com/blackleg/blackleg-industries](https://github.com/blackleg/blackleg-industries)

Si os animais podeis colaborar en su desarrollo.

Descargando para probar.... 

Enhorabuena !

PD: He estado trasteando y de 32 megas lo he bajado a 13 megas convirtiendo las texturas a .dds (por si te interesa).

[@blackleg](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/77845-blackleg/)  ¿Hay alguna novedad en esto?

También, ya que esta fue organizada exclusivamente en KerbalStuff , que recientemente ha apagado , ninguna oportunidad de conseguir este rehosted en su sitio de reemplazo, [SpaceDock.info](http://spacedock.info/) ?

Lo siento por mi español (he usado Google Translate) ... Bad americano es mi único idioma ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

[@Stone Blue](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/77721-stone-blue/): the mod is a pure parts mod at the moment, there is no dll to compile or load. So if you go to the github link in the first post, which still works:

- Click 'Download ZIP' at the top right of the table
- Open the zip file, go into the folder blackleg-industries-master
- Then from there, extract (or drag and drop) just the blackind folder into your KSP GameData folder.

That's all, the parts should show in your game after restart.

The sources and other files are only needed if you intend to edit the parts in Blender or other 3D software.

Thanx [@swjr-swis](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/152460-swjr-swis/) ... I have a unique situation, where I can not readily access any Github domain, and I like to see mods get hosted on multiple mirrors (to help keep them from disappearing, like what has happened with lots of the stuff exclusively hosted on KerbalStuff alone)...  

I thought since it was up on KS before, if the author is still around at all, might be willing to host on SpaceDock as well, again... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
